channel.title: **** Client problem need help (NEWBIE) ****
channel.description:
Hello i do not wish to waste too much of youre time so i shall get straight to the point.
i am trying to start my own private server and i can connect to it though moparscapes client but the source i downloaded came with its own client which i wish to use. i have changed the IP adress so then it connects too my server.
[code]return new URL("http://******scapev2.no-ip.biz:" + (80 + anInt958));[/code]
* = blanked to prevent advertising
this hasent worked when trying to log in.
i am using kylerscapev2 source and client from this thread
URL : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,384920.0.html
Help much appreciated. :D

item.title: **** Client problem need help (NEWBIE) ****
item.dc:creator: @triple629 triple629
item.description:
@triple629 wrote:

Thank you i am now playing : ).

Read full topic

item.title: **** Client problem need help (NEWBIE) ****
item.dc:creator: @triple629 triple629
item.description:
@triple629 wrote:

ok so that code above is fine for others to connect ?

Read full topic

item.title: **** Client problem need help (NEWBIE) ****
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Just change you’re clients IP to 127.0.0.1, and send the client you’ve already made to the people who will be playing you’re server. (Meaning you’re need two copies)

Read full topic

item.title: **** Client problem need help (NEWBIE) ****
item.dc:creator: @triple629 triple629
item.description:
@triple629 wrote:

so that means i send people this client with that code and they can connect but it must be different for me?
if so what do i need to do so then i can connect?

Read full topic

item.title: **** Client problem need help (NEWBIE) ****
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

You have to log into you’re localhost which is 127.0.0.1

Other plays however have to log into you’re no-ip.

Read full topic
